com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Interface SproutsGameState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SproutsInitialState, SproutsStateAfterMiddleSprout, SproutsStateAfterMove, SproutsStateAfterSubmove, SproutsStateWithoutCobwebVertices, SproutsTooltip
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface SproutsGameState
    The graph representation of a sprouts game position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<SproutsEdge> edges()
      Returns the cobweb and submove edges of this game state.
      default void render(ShapeRenderer renderer, float thickness, int circleSegmentCount, boolean displayCobweb)
      Renders this game state.
      default Set<Vertex> vertices()
      Returns the cobweb vertices and sprouts for this game state.

    • Method Detail

      • edges

        Set<SproutsEdge> edges()
        Returns the cobweb and submove edges of this game state.
        Returns:
        cobweb and submove edges of this game state as a set

      • vertices

        default Set<Vertex> vertices()
        Returns the cobweb vertices and sprouts for this game state.
        Returns:
        cobweb vertices and sprouts of this game state as a set

      • render

        default void render(ShapeRenderer renderer,
                    float thickness,
                    int circleSegmentCount,
                    boolean displayCobweb)
        Renders this game state.

        Edges are rendered as polyline points (circles) with straight line segments connecting them.

        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer to render with
        thickness - the thickness of edges and the radius of vertices
        circleSegmentCount - the number of segments for the circles drawn
        displayCobweb - if true, display cobweb vertices and edges
